Homepage

I graduated with a degree in Chemical Engineering from UBC Vancouver (BASc ‘18).I’m currently a Business Process Consultant in Toronto’s Financial District. My hobbies include:

  • writing good (enough-ish) code
  • drinking excessive volumes of caffeine.

I also enjoy:

  • napping
  • travelling
  • sleeping in
  • discovering new electronic music
  • obsessing over my cat, Tofu
  • binge-watching Netflix on a regular basis.

My more productive hobbies include:

  • reading culture articles (My favorites are Monocle Minute, Cereal,and TNQ)
  • weighted jump rope skipping
  • yoga
  • hiking (sometimes)
  • skiing (always).

In my past life, I worked on energy engineering projects at Suncor Energy and Broadsword Corrosion.

I like working on technical puzzles. I am most interested in challenges that lie at the intersection of business and technology.

My email is lauriejiang@alumni.ubc.ca. I’m also on LinkedIn.
